attributes.action: ALLEN KEYS TO BE PROVIDIED WITH SHOWERS AND BATHS ETC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I WANT IT MADE LAW THAT WHEN YOU BUY A SHOWER OR BATH OR ANY GOODS THAT NEED ASSEMBLY WITH AN ALLEN KEY 
IT SHOULD BE PROVIDED WITH THE ITEM THAT YOU PURCHASE

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
